results.description:
The Careers@Gov mobile application allows you to browse & apply for jobs in the Singapore Public Service.

The Singapore Public Service employs about 140,000 public officers working in 16 ministries and more than 50 statutory boards. If you have a passion to serve the people, and want a meaningful career – come join us!

The Singapore Public Service : Integrity . Service . Excellence

For more information, visit our website at www.careers.gov.sg
results.releaseNotes: Fixed issue with data not loading in the app. No longer need permission to access images.

results.description:
"SkillsFuture@PublicService”

This application is a service of the Government of Singapore.

LEARN is a one-stop digital learning platform that lets you learn wherever you go. It also gives you all that you need to upskill and reskill in a digital workplace.

Discover a world of learning resources with CSC’s proprietary content and curated learning pathways from renowned third-party content providers.

Sharpen your skills with personalised content according to Public Service Competency Frameworks and your learning needs.

Activate your account and LEARN today!
results.releaseNotes: Minor performance updates and improvements for launch!

results.description:
MSS’ Weather@SG provides the latest warnings, forecasts and observations at your fingertips. Through this app, users can:
• Receive warnings of heavy rain and other hazards
• Access weather forecasts
• View real-time weather observations 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

For a full suite of weather information, please visit http://www.weather.gov.sg or follow MetServiceSG on Twitter to receive more updates.

The Meteorological Service Singapore (MSS) is Singapore’s national authority on the weather and climate. It is an operations division under the National Environment Agency (NEA).
Our mission is to observe and understand the weather and climate affecting Singapore and to provide services in support of national needs and international co-operation. The key areas within the mission include:
• Collecting and maintaining of reliable long-term national weather records
• Providing reliable weather and climate services
• Conducting high quality research to advance understanding and prediction of the weather and climate of Singapore and the region
• Performing risk and impact assessment of natural environmental hazards

This application is a service of the Singapore government.
results.releaseNotes: Updated the MRT network map

results.description:
This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

myCPF provides you with easy access to your personal CPF information on the go. It also provides you with a quick way to perform Retirement Sum Top-Ups and calculate the amount of CPF contributions payable. You can access your CPF information via the following services using your SingPass:

• My Dashboard 
• My Healthcare
• My Housing
• My Investment
• My Messages
• Transaction History
• Contribution History 

For the full suite of CPF online services, please visit www.cpf.gov.sg.
results.releaseNotes: Introducing the Retirement Sum Topping Up feature! Now, you can top up CPF savings using cash or CPF for yourself and your loved ones.   As part of our ongoing enhancements, myCPF mobile app fingerprint login has been integrated with the recently launched SingPass mobile app. Also comes with minor app fixes and improvements to usability.

results.description:
Provide the Singapore Public Service vacancies information.
SG Gov Job Notification provides following functions:
1. Notification on New Jobs and on Jobs Closing
Application sends notification when new Jobs available and when Jobs closing.
2. Smart Indicator
Clearly indicate for the new vacancies and vacancies approaching deadline.
3. Minimize the use of data transfer
This application only downloads the information when an update is available. 
It does not only minimize the use of data transfer, but also enhance the battery life. 
4. Jobs Detail 
Traditional Chinese and English supported in Jobs Detail when both languages could be shown at the same time for easy reference.
5. My Favorites
Bookmark the Job Detail for easy reference. The marked Job info will keep in application even the job opening is closed.
6. Add to Calendar
7. Share to friends
8. User-friendly UI
Remark: This is not an official application of Singapore Public Service. All information is retrieved from Careers@Gov website. All information changes are subject to information from the system. For official website, please visit www.careers.gov.sg or https://careers-gov-ijpsearch.pageuppeople.com/.

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

The "OneService" mobile application is part of the Government’s on-going efforts to provide a convenient channel for reporting municipal issues within Singapore. The application provides for common categories of municipal issues and more features will be offered under subsequent updates.

Date of Official Launch: 25 January 2015

To provide feedback on the application, please e-mail us at mso_appenquiry@mnd.gov.sg

results.description:
This application is a service of Singapore Government.

eAppt@ICA is the latest initiative from the Immigration & Checkpoints Authority (ICA), which allows members of public to book an appointment with ICA to complete their application processes as well as to change or cancel appointments. With eAppt@ICA, everyone will have the following services at their fingertips:

1) Book appointments* with all 3 Services Centres of ICA.
2) View existing appointments* made with ICA at 'My Appointment' tab.
3) Locate SingPost outlets for alternate site collection of selected ICA documents and passes.
4) Links to other Home Team Departments' homepage. 

Note:
-*Selected services may require you to log in with your SingPass ID before booking an appointment 
- For any enquiries, please email us at ICA_Feedback@ica.gov.sg
results.releaseNotes: Introducing Collection of Birth Certificate

results.description:
This application is a service of the Government of Singapore.

The PaC@Gov mobile application is developed by the Accountant-General’s Department to provide Singapore Government serving officers and pensioners with convenient access to their pay, claims and medical bills information. They can submit claims on-the-go and receive notifications anytime, anywhere. 

Date of official launch: 6 February 2017

If you have any query on the application, please send it to us via the “Help” icon on the menu page. By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Statement of the PaC@Gov Mobile App.
results.releaseNotes: We update the app regularly to make it better for you. Get the latest version to enjoy all available features and improvements. Thank you for using PaC@Gov Mobile App!

results.description:
New OneMap is the authoritative national map of Singapore with the most detailed and timely updated information developed by the Singapore Land Authority. There are also many useful day-to-day information and services contributed by government agencies.

Features of OneMap:

SEARCH: Search for addresses with postal codes and building names.

NAVIGATION: Get driving and public transport directions with walking routes.

FIND NEARBY INFORMATION: Locate nearby amenities and government information.

MAP STYLES: Select from a range of base maps.

FREE TO USE: All maps and features are free to use. No in-app purchases.
If you have any questions or feedback, please drop us an email at onemap@sla.gov.sg

Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/OneMap
results.releaseNotes: - Bug fixes. - App backend improvements.

results.description:
myENV app will need access to certain features on your phone for the following reasons:

• Location
Use your phone’s location to provide you with localised weather information.

• Phone
Let you call NEA hotline conveniently with just one touch.

• Photos/Media/Files
Allow you to save photographs taken with myENV app in your phone and to attach them when you file a report to NEA.

• Camera
Access the phone’s camera if you wish to attach a photograph while making a Report to NEA.

• Device ID & Call Information
Read your phone’s UUID so that you can register and receive push notifications. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Get the latest environmental news updates and information at your finger tips based on your current location with myENV:

• Access real-time information on Singapore’s weather and receive heavy rainfall alerts
• View latest air quality information
• Locate dengue clusters and improve dengue situation awareness
• Search for hawker centres by name or proximity
• Obtain useful information such as current listings of licensed food caterers and vector control operators
• Get 3R (Reduce, Reuse and Recycle) tips
• View latest NEA’s events and happenings
• Sign up as a volunteer
• Submit your feedback to NEA on your mobile device and many more!

For a full suite of information and online services, please visit http://www.nea.gov.sg or follow NEAsg on Twitter to receive more updates.

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

results.releaseNotes: - Bug fixes

results.description:
Police@SG is the initiative from the Singapore Police Force, which gives members of public access to useful information on the go. With Police@SG, everyone will have the following services at their fingertips:

- Read the latest crime news, police appeals for information and missing persons
- Locate the nearest police station from your current location
- Share content on Facebook and Twitter
- Links to Singapore Police Force homepage, recruitment and social media sites
- Submit information or respond to police appeals via our information submission portal "i-Witness"

The Singapore Police Force - A force for the Nation
results.releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes on iWitness module

results.description:
UPDATE (24/10): We are looking into the "settings altered" alert prompt reported by our users. The app was designed with stringent security measures to safeguard our SingPass accounts. We kindly ask for your patience while the team investigates more based on the reports received so far. Thank you!

Log in within seconds using your fingerprint or 6-digit passcode.

KEY FEATURES

- Say goodbye to long passwords

With the SingPass Mobile app, you don’t have to enter your SingPass ID or password. Simply scan or tap the QR code to launch the app, verify and you’re in!

- Transact securely on-the-go

Going for a holiday or staying overseas? Enjoy greater mobility when you use the new SingPass Mobile app. No more waiting for SMS OTP, or carrying a token around!

- Be secure every step of the way

We’ve got several layers of security measures in place to protect your personal data. You only need to log in with your fingerprint or enter a 6-digit passcode to verify your identity for all transactions.

- Log in like a pro with QR

Log in by scanning a QR code using your SingPass Mobile QR code scanner. If you’re using a mobile device, simply tap on the QR code to launch the app.

- Better together

We will be adding new features into the app to help you manage your data and transactions better, so keep your app updated!

SET UP IN 3 EASY STEPS

To set up, all you need is a smartphone, an internet connection, and a registered SingPass account.

- Step 1
Install SingPass Mobile by clicking the button above.

- Step 2
Complete a one-time set up.

- Step 3
You’re all set. Log in to government digital services using your fingerprint or 6-digit passcode – it’s that simple!

FEEDBACK

We want to hear from you! For any feedback or questions, please email us at support@singpass.gov.sg.

Note: SingPass Mobile can only be installed on one device at a time.

This application is bought to you by the Government Technology Agency of Singapore.

APP PERMISSIONS

In order to provide the service, the app requests certain permissions.

[Mandatory]
Phone: Your Device ID is used to tie your device to your SingPass account as part of the verification process during logins. Android groups Device ID and call information in a single permission group, but the app does not access or monitor your calls.

[Mandatory]
Photos, media and files: This allows us to save an identifier to prevent unauthorised access and help troubleshoot issues in a timely fashion if needed. The app does not access, read or store any of your personal files.

The following requirements are recommended for an optimised user experience:
- Minimum Android version 4.4
- At least 100MB storage space
- Google Play services installed
results.releaseNotes: Improved stability for fingerprint login Reduced app install size Bug fixes and stability improvements

results.description:
Customs@SG is a latest service offering by Singapore Customs. 

Travellers with purchases exceeding their personal duty free concession or Goods & Services Tax (GST) relief can use the app to declare and pay the duty and/or GST for the goods purchased, anytime anywhere prior to their arrival in Singapore. 

The app also allows members of the public to provide timely tip-off on customs offences, feedback or send enquiries relating to Customs matters. 

With Customs@SG, you can easily access the following services at your fingertips: 

- Declare and pay duty and/or GST on your overseas purchases
- Provide tip-offs on customs offences
- Provide feedback on customs matters

Provided by the National Library Board Singapore, the application allows library patrons to:

• Set up multiple user profiles

• Manage loans and reservations

results.description:
The Vendors@Gov mobile application is developed by the Accountant-General’s Department to facilitate government vendors to manage their e-invoices and payments on the go. Vendors can now have access to the following new functions:

a. View the summary status of e-invoices and projected cashflow in easy-to-understand charts; and
b. Receive alerts on payment/rejection of e-invoices, changes in vendor account status and details, as well as broadcast messages.

The mobile application will also contain existing functions on the Vendors@Gov portal: 

a. Viewing of e-invoices and payments; 
b. Creation and submission of e-invoices; and
c. Viewing of vendor account details and updating of these records (except for bank account).

Date of official launch: 15 June 2016
To provide feedback on the application, please email us at https://app.helpdesk.agd.gov.sg/public_user/vendor/vendor/helpdesk.aspx.
By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Statement of the Vendors@Gov Mobile App.
results.releaseNotes: We update the app regularly to make it better for you. Get the latest version to enjoy all available features and improvements. Thank you for using Vendors@Gov Mobile App!

results.description:
IMDA’s Wireless@SG app provides features catering to the needs of people who are constantly "on the move". Through this app, users can:

- Setup Wireless@SG and get connected automatically
- View and find the nearest up-to-date Wireless@SG hotspots
- Rate the Wireless@SG hotspots

To help us improve this app, you are welcome to email us at: info@imda.gov.sg

results.description:
We’ve refreshed our website and mobile app to bring you a brand new experience. 

You can continue to access our whole range of services at your convenience:

* Check your sales application results, the BTO flats available for selection, and their probable completion dates

* View the recent transacted prices of resale flats and the ethnic quotas, at the location of your choice

The Housing & Development Board (HDB) is Singapore's public housing authority and a statutory board under the Ministry of National Development.

results.description:
This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

See an interesting animal or plant? Share it with us through the SGBioAtlas app! SGBioAtlas is a citizen-science platform for nature lovers to share their biodiversity sightings and uses crowd-sourced information to map the distribution of flora and fauna across Singapore. It is not only simple to use, it is also a fun way to learn more about the amazing diversity of animals and plants in our City in a Garden. Every sighting you record will contribute to our database of precious local biodiversity.

This app is brought to you by the National Parks Board (NParks) as part of the Community in Nature (CIN) initiative. As the lead agency on nature conservation, NParks has developed an urban biodiversity conservation model, which aims to conserve representative eco-systems in land-scarce Singapore. NParks also monitors and coordinates measures to enhance the presence of biodiversity in our urban landscape.

Find out more about us at www.nparks.gov.sg.

Date released: 16 Apr 2015

For technical issues, please e-mail biome_support@neseapl.com

For general queries, please e-mail CIN@nparks.gov.sg.
results.releaseNotes: Application bug fix

results.description:
One-stop access to health records of your family, friends, children. Learn, manage and improve your health, schedule your appointments, check your personal health records, access your immunisation, screening and lab test results, view your child’s upcoming immunisation schedule and more*!

HealthHub is your personal digital health companion by the Ministry of Health and Health Promotion Board Singapore. 

Features: 
• Appointments: Make, view, reschedule, cancel 

• Medications: Access your prescription records and medication lists

• Refill: Request for medication refill or renewal of prescription

• Payments: Pay for your medical bills 

• Children Health: Track your child’s developmental milestones and vaccination records as well as upcoming immunisation schedule

• Family Health: View your parents’ medical appointments and medication lists 

• School Health: Get notified of school health assessments and your child’s referral letters 

• Directory Listing: Find doctors, caregivers, 24 hour CHAS clinics easily

• Healthpoints: Be rewarded when you read articles and complete quizzes

* Participating restructured hospitals, polyclinics and specialist outpatient clinics from the public healthcare sector.
results.releaseNotes: Request for a copy of your medical report via HealthHub for selected hospitals and make a direct debit payment for such report requests. For parents, you can receive notifications on your children’s upcoming immunisation schedule on your smartphone and view the upcoming vaccinations for the next 6 months in HealthHub.  Check your CHAS (Community Health Assist Scheme) subsidy balance and transaction history online and your caregivers can view them too if you have granted them consent.

results.description:
This application is a service of Singapore Government.

Be empowered for an all new travelling experience

MyTransport.SG Mobile, an award winning app launched by Land Transport Authority (LTA), is a content-rich service offering a wide range of information for all modes of land transportation – empowering commuters, motorists and cyclists in Singapore to make informed decisions and better plan their journey, with these features:

• Personalise your favourite services with MyConcierge
• Search and locate nearby bus stops and service number with bus route details
• Get real-time island-wide bus arrival information
• Search and locate nearby taxi stands and quick dial for taxi booking services
• Report road defects via Snap & Send 

• Get real-time parking lots availability for popular locations
• Plan route with Traffic News and ERP Gantries on Traffic Smart
• View live traffic images along all expressways round the island
• Receive notification on expressways traffic news during peak hours and train service delay information
• Explore cycling towns, routes, and parking facilities
• Find out lifestyle events and promotions nearby

This app is proud to be a multiple local and international awards winners in:

• 2014 Best Global m-Government Service Award, Dubai
• 2013 Singapore infocomm Technology Federation (SiTF) Awards, Gold Winner in Most Popular Mobile Apps category and Silver Winner in Mobile Applications category
• 2013 UiTP Grow with Public Transport International Awards, Integrated Mobility category
• 2013 eGov Excellence Awards, Distinguished Winner in mServices category
• 2013 Singapore Mobile Excellence Awards, Gold Winner in Best App/Content by Government/Community category
• 2012 Summit Emerging Media Awards, Visionary Award in Navigation App category 
• 2012 W3 Awards, Silver Award in Maps and Navigation mobile app category

For the full suite of land transport information and e-Services, please visit: http://www.mytransport.sg

Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
results.releaseNotes: General enhancements and bug fixes

results.description:
SG TravelKaki provides you with important information on what travellers can (and cannot) bring back into Singapore from their overseas trips. 

The app also allows you to:

SG TravelKaki app is developed by Agri-Food & Veterinary Authority of Singapore and supported by:

Let us know what you think and how we can improve the app at ava_apps@ava.gov.sg.

results.description:
The new MyTransport.SG mobile app now offers you with more useful travelling information and new features to help you get around Singapore. 

New features of MyTransport.SG:
• Personalisation - Quick access to your frequently used bus service and traffic information.
• My Notifications - Manage push notifications to receive MRT or Road alerts that interest you.
• Near You - View information on nearby bus services, MRT stations or traffic information in the vicinity.
• Multi-modal Journey Planner - Start planning your journey with different transport options based on your travel needs.

This application is a service of Singapore Government.

Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background may decrease battery life.
results.releaseNotes: Offering more useful travel information and new features to help you get around Singapore!

results.description:
Enjoy fast and easy access to commonly used statistics on Singapore’s economy and population with the SingStat mobile app. The data are presented in chart and tabular formats covering 25 data categories, including Population, Prices, Labour, Manufacturing, Services and International Trade.

Its key features include allowing the selection of data frequency (e.g. monthly, quarterly or annual), presentation of data in chart or tabular form, drilled down function for data to more detailed levels, information on the data coverage and definition, and release dates of key statistical indicators.

For more information, please visit https://www.singstat.gov.sg/our-services-and-tools/singstat-mobile-app

The mobile application is designed for devices with Android OS 4.1.2 and above.
results.releaseNotes: Minor adjustments

results.description: The MFA@SG mobile app provides Singaporean travellers with convenient access to real-time updates of consular information and services, including eRegister and Travel Notices. It has a geolocation feature to help you locate the nearest Singapore Overseas Mission based on your current location. Download it today and stay in touch!

results.description: MySkillsFuture empowers you on your learning journey and career path. Uncover insights into various industries and jobs, find courses to help you upskill, read informative articles and online resources to support your career exploration, and join events to unlock learning and career opportunities.
results.releaseNotes: • Security update • Fine-tuned UI design • This updated version is only supported on devices running Android 5.0 and above

results.description: The EventTech for Gov SG app is the official mobile app for the Event Tech for Singapore Government event. With the app, it’s convenient for you to have an overall look at the programme and design your schedule.

This application is a service of Singapore Government

About ACRA On The Go
ACRA On The Go is a mobile extension of some of the frequently used services currently available on BizFile+ - ACRA’s online business filing and information portal.

You can conduct free directory search of all the business entities registered with ACRA. This allows directors, business owners and staff of the entities, business associates, securities, research companies or consumers to conduct due diligence checks on the business entities. In addition, they can also purchase business profiles, compliance and financial profiles, or extracts via the app to get detailed information on the business entities.

You can also perform a range of filing service such renewal of business registration, change of address for Business/ LP/ LLP, transaction status enquiries and many other services while on the go.

The following services are available on the ACRA On The Go mobile app:

1. Directory Search – You can search for business related information such as UEN, business name, business status, business address, industry and year of financial statements filed.

2. iShop@ACRA – You can purchase business information products such as Business Profile, electronic certificates and extracts, etc.

3. Transaction Enquiry – You can check the status of your transaction which you have lodged with ACRA.

4. Renewal of Business/ LP and other filing services – You can do other filing services such as Change of Address for Business/ LP/ LLP, Change of FYE for Local Company, Annual Declaration Filing for LLP and Cessation of Business/ LP.

5. AGM Calculator – You can use our calculator to help you to calculate your AGM due date for local companies, annual filing due date for foreign company or annual declaration due date for LLP.

6. Ask Jamie – Our virtual assistant ‘Ask Jamie@ACRA’ will answer your queries on matter relating to ACRA.

7. ACRA Connect –You can subscribe to ACRA Connect to keep you updated on new initiatives and upcoming events. Through ACRA Connect, we also share insights into key policies and legislative changes.

Date of Official Launch: 06 November 2016 
To provide feedback on the application,
Please e-mail us at
https://www.acra.gov.sg/ask_ACRA_FAQs
results.releaseNotes: Integrate with Singpass Mobile App

results.description:
This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

CPF Starter is a handy resource tool that gives an overview of your CPF, from projecting the growth of your CPF savings to how you can better use these savings for your housing, healthcare and retirement needs.

CPF Starter won the Mob-Ex Awards 2016 for Best App - Utility (Gold) and Best App - Creative (Bronze).

Features: 
CPF Savings Projection:
- Calculate how much CPF contributions you and your employer need to make
- Find out how much CPF goes into your Ordinary, Special and MediSave Accounts
- Project how your CPF savings will grow over the years in each of these accounts with the power of compound interest

My Messages
- Get the latest CPF news and notifications about upcoming events on the go

Information on using CPF for Housing, Healthcare and Retirement: 
- Learn more about the various CPF schemes and services
- Get useful tips on managing cash flow
results.releaseNotes: Updated information.

results.description:
SGSecure is a national movement to sensitise, train and mobilise Singaporeans to play a part to prevent and deal with a terrorist attack.

Use the SGSecure app to: 
- Receive important broadcast messages from the authorities on the latest situation in the event of major emergencies
- Seek assistance from the authorities should a major situation happen in your vicinity
- Send videos, photos and messages to the authorities to provide information on a situation which you have witnessed
- Access links to Police@SG and myResponder apps
- Access links to the SGSecure programme information and information that can help you to better protect and take care of yourself and others in an emergency. 

Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
results.releaseNotes: - Access terror-related travel advisories and notices by MFA - UI enhancements Please update to the latest version as some of the functions may not work in earlier versions.  For Support, please contact: - Telephone: 66849554 or Email: SGSecure_TechSupport@ncs.com.sg

results.description:
CorpPass is the required login method for online transactions with the government. First launched for Singapore-registered business entities and SingPass-backed users, it is now available for foreigners who need to transact with the Singapore government.

Enjoy the following benefits with CorpPass.

• Enhanced data protection for businesses and employees, with separate login IDs for corporate and personal matters

• Increased convenience to transact with multiple government agencies, with each user having a single corporate digital identity and no longer handling multiple login IDs for different services.

• Better internal control within businesses, as key personnel can grant and manage employees access to each government digital service.

For more information, visit www.corppass.gov.sg/corppass/common/findoutmore > Foreign Registered Entities Tab.
results.releaseNotes: Improved stability for fingerprint login Reduced app install size Bug fixes and stability improvements

results.description:
Healthy 365 mobile app is brought to you by the Health Promotion Board (HPB).
This app enables you to track your daily steps count and calculate the corresponding calories burned as you move. Among other tracking sources, you can use Samsung Health to track steps. With a compatible wearable that tracks heart rate, you can also track the duration engaged in higher intensity physical activities. Steps and heart rate data from Samsung Health can be shared with Healthy 365 mobile app while participating in Health Challenges.


Key features include:
• Dashboard that provide you with an overview of your fitness, Healthpoints and rewards information.
• Health Challenges that enable you to step up to get healthy, earn Healthpoints and redeem rewards
• New Eat Drink Shop Healthy Challenge digital passport with more rewards that can be earned along with Healthpoints when you make healthier purchases
• History charts to keep records of your past steps count, heart rate, distance covered and calorie intake and output 
• Healthpoints history function that allows tracking of your scans from healthier food, drink or grocery consumption
• Nearby listing and map views on HPB events, healthier eateries, exercise facilities and routes in your vicinity
• Integration with new HPB steps trackers and exercise apps including Actxa® and Fitbit® 
• Sync for Friends function to allow both non-smartphone and smartphone participants to conveniently sync their steps on their friend or family member’s smartphone
• Background location detection of nearby Scan&Win Hotspots for earning Healthpoints

Note:
• This app uses background location for detection of outdoor Hotspots
• Continued use of GPS running in the background may dramatically decrease battery life
• For the optimum experience, please ensure that your phone is set to Singapore Time zone (GMT +8)
• For any enquiries, please call our hotline at 1800 567 2020 or email us at stepschallenge@hpb.gov.sg
results.releaseNotes: This app release includes the following updates/changes: • Support for Polar fitness app to pair with and allow Healthy 365 to retrieve Steps & Heart Rate data • Enhanced security using OTP verification when performing healthpoints related transactions • Miscellaneous bug fixes

results.description:
Hello Everyone, 

Streetdirectory App comes Offline maps & real-time bus timing

Whats New - Unlimited History Searches (Previously only 3) - Easily share map location, directions & businesses - Easily save your favourite locations (no login required) - Easily search from map page 2. New & updated data - updated carpark rates in all buildings - New bus-stops added - Updated ERP rates - All mosques shows prayer times - 2018 Maps

results.description:
Singapore has a huge capacity to adjust foreigner skilled and experienced workers in different departments. 
Singapore n government always tries to hire more skilled and trained labor and workers from other countries for its industries and other companies. 
Singapore normally hires these workers through local, but reputable recruiting agencies.
However, there are thousands of recruiting agents which hire workers under the supervision of Singapore n management.

results.description:
SGWorkPass is a free mobile app to check the validity of work passes / long term passes issued by the Singapore Ministry of Manpower (MOM).

A must have app for all employers, foreign employees, agents or anyone who wishes to verify if a work pass / long term pass card issued by MOM is valid. You will need a Singapore mobile number for a one-time registration in order to start using the app.

Scan it to check it
A work pass / long term pass may be cancelled before it expires as employment / stay status can change over time. When this happens, the pass holder is not allowed to continue working / staying in Singapore. Simply launch the SGWorkPass app to scan the QR code of a work pass / long term pass card and you can verify its validity instantly.

No QR Code? No problem!
If the work pass / long term pass card doesn’t have a QR code, you can verify it using the unique Card Serial Number printed on the card.

results.description:
The Urban Redevelopment Authority ("URA") provides comprehensive and timely real estate information to enhance the transparency of the Singapore property market and to facilitate developers, property owners and the general public in making informed decisions on land development, property investment/purchases and leasing.

This application includes information on sale prices and rentals of private residential properties in Singapore (including prices of units sold by developers).

Whilst every reasonable endeavour has been made to ensure that the contents of the Property Market Information are accurate and complete, the URA does not warrant the accuracy, correctness and completeness of such contents and shall not be responsible for any injury, loss or damage whatsoever may arise as a result of any use of or reliance on such contents.

results.description:
Wondering how much difference that pay rise would make in Singapore? Use our app to work out tax and reliefs on your wage for Year of Assessment 2017, based on the official rates from the Inland Revenue Authority of Singapore (IRAS).

Simply enter your income. The calculator will then show you your effective tax rate and after-tax income.

Taking into account:
- Employment income
- Employment expenses
- Trade, business or vocation
- Dividends
- Interest
- Rental income from property
- Royalty, charge, estate income
- Gains or profits of an income nature
- Approved donations
- Earned income relief
- Working mother relief
- Parent relief
- Grandparent caregiver relief
- CPF (Central Provident Fund) relief
- Life insurance relief
- Course fees relief
- Foreign maid levy relief
- CPF cash top-up relief
- Supplementary retirement relief
- NSman relief
results.releaseNotes: App launch

results.description:
ActiveSG

Download this free mobile app and start exploring sports and activity venues located throughout Singapore. Designed for smartphone users to make searches, reservations, registrations, purchases and quick payments, all in one convenient, feature-rich app. Real-time access to all facilities and programmes made available to the public by Sport Singapore. 


Key features:

All user types
Registered users. Verified members. Supplementary (family) accounts. Junior (under-16) members. All can use ActiveSG with varying privileges. 

Smart search 
Search for a sports facility nearby, view its location and check its amenities. Ask the app to recommend best possible venues for your interests.

End-to-end booking
Venue, date and time selection. Course registrations. Event sign-ups. Shopping cart with options for add-on items. Payments, cancellations and refunds.

One-touch booking
The app remembers all your previous bookings so you can grab your favourite slots the next time round. No need to retrace your steps.

Virtual ID
Check in and check out of a swim or gym facility, by scanning the QR code on your mobile phone screen (after buying an entry pass).

Tags : ActiveSG, ActiveWallet, Active SG, Active Wallet, Sport Singapore, Sports, Swim, Gym, Facilities Booking, Programmes, iAPPS

results.description:
Uncovering heritage and social stories.

Whether you're a local or a tourist visiting Singapore, explore and embark on heritage trails and experience the untold stories behind the streets and landmarks of Singapore.

Singapore Heritage Trails documents and showcases different areas that Singaporeans live, work and play. It also provides a social platform for you to participate and leave stories and memories of how these places evoke on you, bringing out rich and authentic emotions behind these historical places.

This app is created by NHB (National Heritage Board), Singapore Government in collaboration with the Crowd Trails team from Keio-NUS CUTE Center, National University of Singapore.
results.releaseNotes: Bug Fixes

results.description:
Calculate parking fees automatically
Key in your vehicle number, select the car park and indicate your estimated parking duration. Your charges will be automatically calculated (free parking timings, whole-day parking, night parking are all included).

Pay for parking digitally
Pay using your credit or debit card and start parking.

Track and extend your parking session remotely
Receive notifications when your parking session is expiring or has ended. Extend your parking session without having to return to your vehicle.

End your parking session early
End your parking session if you're back at your vehicle early. A refund based on the actual parked duration will be given.

Known Issues:
* Confirmation screen gets partially cut-off on the HTC U11 and HTC 10 because of HTC Boost+ app optimisation. Turn off the Boost+ app optimisation for the app and it will work.
* Delayed notifications on China brand phones like Xiaomi, Huawei, Oppo. This is due to their aggressive battery optimisation. Add the app to the Protected Apps list to solve the delayed notifications issue.
results.releaseNotes: You can now export your parking history as a pdf

The Master Plan is the statutory land use plan which guides Singapore's development in the medium term over the next 10 to 15 years. The Master Plan shows the permissible land use and density for developments in Singapore and is reviewed every five years. The Master Plan is to be read together with the Master Plan Written Statement.

This is the Master Plan 2014. The Master Plan 2014 and Master Plan Written Statement 2014 have been approved by the Minister for National Development on 27 May 2014. The Master Plan Written Statement 2014 and all subsequent amendments to the Master Plan and the Master Plan Written Statement are available at the Urban Redevelopment Authority (URA) website at http://www.ura.gov.sg/.

Whilst every endeavour has been made to ensure that the contents of the Master Plan 2014 is represented accurately, the URA and the Singapore Government disclaim all liability for any injury, loss or damage whatsoever that may arise as a result of any inaccuracy, error or omission.

©Singapore Government. All rights reserved.
results.releaseNotes: Bug fixes.

results.description:
The written history of Singapore may date back to the third century. Evidence suggests that a significant trading settlement existed in Singapore during the 14th century. In the late 14th century, Singapura was under the rule of Parameswara until he was expelled by the Majapahit or the Siamese. It then came under the Malacca Sultanate and then the Johor Sultanate. Modern Singapore was founded in 1819, when Sir Thomas Stamford Raffles negotiated a treaty whereby Johor allowed the British to found a trading port on the island.

During World War II, Singapore was conquered and occupied by the Japanese Empire from 1942 to 1945. When the war ended, Singapore reverted to British control, with increasing levels of self-government being granted, culminating in Singapore's merger with the Federation of Malaya to form Malaysia in 1963. However, social unrest and disputes between Singapore's ruling People's Action Party and Malaysia's Alliance Party resulted in Singapore's expulsion from Malaysia. Singapore became an independent republic on August 9, 1965.

The perfect Singapore app for locals to get Transport News Update from the Official Sites. News are pulled from Social medias of Land Transport Authority, Ministry of Transport, SMRT, SBS Transit, Tower Transit, Go-Ahead and Public Transport. We usually missed social media posting from the official sites if we are not on their page and we need to visit multiple sites to find information from time to time. This app brings information from every official site and consolidate them for your easy access. You can custom what you want to see by opt-in/opt-out from any of the Officials. All news is default opt-in and will update every 2 hours. You can change the setting and explore features. With offline reading mode, you can read the news even when you are on the move.

What you get:
Latest 24 hours updates
Unreads news
Stared news

results.description:
Wireless Singapore app brings a lighter, more useful app to those seeking free wireless hotspots in Singapore using the Wireless@SG and Wireless@SGx networks. This app is for people looking to connect Wireless Singapore loads faster, smarter, and has a more streamlined UI compared to what is currently available. In this app, users can:

- View and find the nearest up-to-date hotspots
- Browse the map to show destination hotspots available. 

Want improvements? Let us know by either commenting or emailing us.
results.releaseNotes: Constantly adding new hotspots! We have 1105 hotspots ready for you! This release has faster loading and allows you to use the Wireless Singapore without giving the My Location permissions - although, we still recommend it.

results.description:
SP Utilities brings you fast and convenient access to your utilities account on the go. You can manage your account, view and pay bills as well as subscribe to new services that you need.

- Be informed about your latest bill via push notifications
- Add and save your credit card information securely for greater convenience
- View your smart meter consumption on daily intervals
- Browse past bills and payment history
- Submit meter readings for electricity, gas, water consumption
- Manage and update your utility details

With the SP Utilities mobile app, we aim to deliver a more unified, seamless experience for our customers. SP Group is a leading energy utilities group in the Asia Pacific. It owns and operates electricity and gas transmission and distribution businesses in Singapore and Australia, and district cooling businesses in Singapore and China. SP Group is committed to providing customers with reliable and efficient energy utilities services. More than 1.4 million industrial, commercial and residential customers in Singapore benefit from SP Group’s world-class transmission, distribution and market support services. These networks are amongst the most reliable and cost-effective world-wide. For more information, please visit spgroup.com.sg or follow us on Facebook at fb.com/SPGroupSG.
results.releaseNotes: Go green with us! Opt out of your paper bills to earn 3,000 CapitaSTAR$ (only applicable to customers on paper bill)

Justice@State Courts mobile app provides information on the hearing dates in the State Courts and other information services such as filling instructions, virtual tour of courtrooms and access to legal aid services for the convenience of public users via its user-friendly interface. The application is available across popular mobile platforms.
